rules.asp_rule: merchant_confirmation_satisfies(C) :- goods_sale_contract(C), between_merchants(C), confirmation_sent(C, P1, P2), not objection_within_10_days(P2).
specially_manufactured_satisfies(C) :- goods_sale_contract(C), specially_manufactured_goods(C), substantial_beginning_made(C).
part_performance_satisfies(C) :- land_sale_contract(C), possession_taken(C), improvements_made(C), unequivocally_referable(C).
admission_satisfies(C) :- contract_fact(C), admission_in_pleadings(C, Party), party_to_contract(C, Party).
sufficient_writing(C) :- writing_fact(W), references_contract(W, C), signed_by(W, P), party_to_contract(C, P), essential_terms_stated(W).
rules.reasoning: Refinement of writing requirement with essential terms (variant 1)
